modShortDescription: Increases the max FOV to 150, though anything above 90 is a bit distorted. Might be good for folks with motion sickness.
modDescription:
Increases the max FOV to 150, though anything above 90 is a bit distorted. Might be good for folks with motion sickness.

This is a C# Mod (cannot be server only, EAC must be off!).

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/KhaineGB/KhaineA20ModletsHarmony/tree/main/KHA20-LargerFOV)**
